client.namespace: <Namespace> // namespace of generated proxy, defaults to contract namespace if null
client.suffix: <Suffix> // suffix for generated client proxy, defaults to 'Proxy'
client.name: <ProxyName> // name of generated proxy, defaults to 'ContractName + Suffix' if null

server.stateFullBase: <FullTypeName> // base class used for statefull invokers
server.generatorEx: <GeneratorName> // user defined generator for invoker extensions
server.namespace: <Namespace> // namespace of generated server invoker, defaults to contract namespace if null
server.suffix: <Suffix> // suffix for generated server invokers, defaults to 'Invoker'
server.name: <ProxyName> // name of generated server invoker, defaults to 'ContractName + Suffix' if null
server.generator: <GeneratorName> // user defined generator for server invokers
